Primary Executive: Lisa Binnie, Executive Director; Email: kelfamcr.ed@shawbiz.ca
Service Details: Provides counselling services for children, youth and their families who may be experiencing challenges in the following areas:  difficult behavior, living in a blended or separated family situation, parent/child conflicts, sole parenting, conflicting parenting styles, grief and loss, sexual intrusive behavior
How to Apply: Please consult the Child and Youth Mental Health team for a referral: 250.861.7301
Address & Map: 347 Leon Ave, #204Kelowna, BC     V1Y 8C7View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Partially Accessible - handicap washrooms are not available
